See https://aka.ms/efcore-docs-default-values for more information.

Consider using a nullable type, using a nullable backing field, or setting the sentinel value for the property to ensure the database default is used when, and only when, appropriate. See https://aka.ms/efcore-docs-default-values for more information.

2025-12-25 21:22:57.204 +02:00 [WRN] The 'bool' property 'IsDeleted' on entity type 'Badges' is configured with a database-generated default, but has no configured sentinel value. The database-generated default will always be used for inserts when the property has the value 'False', since this is the CLR default for the 'bool' type. Consider using a nullable type, using a nullable backing field, or setting the sentinel value for the property to ensure the database default is used when, and only when, appropriate. See https://aka.ms/efcore-docs-default-values for more information.

Consider using a nullable type, using a nullable backing field, or setting the sentinel value for the property to ensure the database default is used when, and only when, appropriate. See https://aka.ms/efcore-docs-default-values for more information.

See https://aka.ms/efcore-docs-default-values for more information.

2025-12-25 22:35:33.865 +02:00 [ERR] Failed executing DbCommand (1,168ms) [Parameters=[@__request_TeacherId_0='?' (DbType = Int64)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."ID" AS "Id", t."ClassId", c0."Name" AS "ClassName", c0."Grade", t."SubjectId", s0."Name" AS "SubjectName", t."AssignedAt"
FROM "Teacher"."TeacherClassAssignments" AS t
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT c."ID", c."Grade", c."Name"
    FROM "General"."Classes" AS c
    WHERE NOT (c."IsDeleted")
) AS c0 ON t."ClassId" = c0."ID"
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT s."ID", s."Name"
    FROM "General"."Subjects" AS s
    WHERE NOT (s."IsDeleted")
) AS s0 ON t."SubjectId" = s0."ID"
WHERE NOT (t."IsDeleted") AND t."TeacherId" = @__request_TeacherId_0 AND NOT (t."IsDeleted")
